title: $TRUMP Meme Coin - Cryptocurrency Corruption
summary: Launched cryptocurrency 3 days before inauguration. Trump and affiliates control 80% of coin supply. Soared to $15 billion valuation before crashing 90%. ~764,000 wallets have lost money. Trump family made $320+ million in trading fees. Sen. Chris Murphy: 'Single most corrupt act ever committed by a president.' Allows anonymous foreign money to flow directly to president.
keyFacts: Trump and affiliates control 80% of coin supply
Soared to $15 billion valuation before crashing 90%
Trump family made $320+ million in trading fees
Sen. Chris Murphy: 'Single most corrupt act ever committed by a president'
Allows anonymous foreign money to flow directly to president
No disclosure of who is buying or where money comes from

sources.text: Sen. Chris Murphy: 'The most corrupt thing a president has ever done'
Sen. Murphy introduces legislation to prohibit presidents from profiting off meme coins
Decrypt: 'Most Corrupt Act': Sen. Chris Murphy Moves to Ban Trump From Shilling Meme Coin
The Hill: Senate Democrat slams Trump's 'grift' meme coins
